snippet: Though imperfect, the agreement is a good deal for the city and its students.
abstract: Editorial applauds New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio and United Federation of Teachers for reaching labor agreement and demonstrating progress that can be made through show of good will; says agreement contains sensible provisions that benefit both teachers and city; expresses hope that contract will set promising pattern for remaining contracts.
lead_paragraph: Though imperfect, the agreement is a good deal for the city and its students.

headline.main: A Teachers’ Contract for New York
headline.print_headline: A Teachers’ Contract for New York
